I am a Master of Applied Science student at the ECE Department of University of British Columbia. I am with the Human Communication Technologies Lab supervised by Prof. Sidney Fels. Go to my CV for more detailed information.

Research Interest

3D computer vision including but not limited to Multi-View Stereo, Structure from Motion, Photometric Stereo, Physics-based Vision.
